validation.itemExists: An item titled "${name}" already exists in this folder. Please choose a different title.
validation.titleInUseService: A layer titled "${name}" already exists. Please choose a different title.
validation.itemInRecycleBin: An item titled "${name}" already exists and is in the recycle bin. Please choose a different title.
validation.serviceNameInvalid: The title of a service may only contain alphanumeric characters or underscores and be 90 characters or less.
validation.dataStoreTitleInvalid: The title of a data store may only contain alphanumeric characters or underscores and be 90 characters or less.
validation.titleInvalid: The title must be less than 250 characters and cannot contain < or >.
validation.titleStartsWithNumber: The title cannot start with a number.

invalidCharacters.single: The name cannot contain this character: ${invalidCharacters}.
invalidCharacters.multiple: The name cannot contain any of these characters: ${invalidCharacters}.
invalidCharacters.unknown: The name cannot contain any of these characters: ${invalidCharacters}.
